items.title: Lux Mainnet
items.description: Lux Mainnet is the final and production-ready version of the blockchain where users can interact with the network and transact with real world assets.

items.title: Lux Mainnet
items.description: Lux Mainnet is the final and production-ready version of the blockchain where users can interact with the network and transact with real world assets.

items.title: The Primary Network
items.description: Lux features 3 built-in blockchains which includes Exchange Chain (X-Chain), Platform Chain (P-Chain), and Contract Chain (C-Chain). More info here.
